(:action obtain
  ; Obtain a resource and change its state or location
  :parameters (?entity - object ?location1 - place ?location2 - place)
  :precondition (and (available ?entity) (at ?entity ?location1))
  :effect (and (obtained ?entity) (at ?entity ?location2))

(:action peel
    :parameters (?entity - object ?tool - object ?location - place)
    :precondition (and (obtained ?entity) 
                       (intact ?entity outer_layer) 
                       (sharp ?tool) 
                       (at ?tool ?location) 
                       (at ?entity ?location))
    :effect (and (not (intact ?entity outer_layer))
